title: Tamana Shokudo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. たまな食堂, at 東京都港区南青山3-8-27, is a pescatarian restaurant that serves vegan and organic food and fish. Around 3 items on the a la carte menu are non-vegetarian; everything else including all the set meals are vegan. Also has a small grocery section, and holds cooking classes. Located in a quiet corner of Omotesando.
